transcript:
Customer: [unintelligible]
Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Aa namaskaram sir Sindhu matladutunnanu sir.
Executive: Aa madam garu namaskaram madam.
Customer: Namaskaram sir.
Executive: Aa madam garu.
Customer: Idi manaku catalogue indulo add siru siru.
Executive: Aa sir aa browser catalogue lo velli add cheste aa like this image rejected during upload ani vastundi sir.
Customer: Ante ardham kaledu madam.
Executive: Aa adi automatic ga reject ayitundi sir aa browser add cheste browser photo add cheste it's rejected automatically during upload ani vastundi.
Customer: Entlaga madam mari adi cheyadam elaga antaru.
Executive: Aa taraledu sir nenu inko sari try chesi chustanu adi so three times add chesa browser ayite adi again and again automatic ga reject ayitundi.
Customer: Nenu itla mana profile lo nenu idi try chestunnanu madam.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aa mana website pages dantlo try chesanu.
Executive: Sarendi sir.
Customer: Aa description pettanu konchamu taravata.
Executive: Mi separate website unda sandwich groups ki.
Customer: Ledu ledu mana IndiaMART dantlone.
Executive: Okay okay.
Customer: IndiaMART dantlone idi pettanu photo aa photos and documents kindha oka option undu.
Executive: Ippudu mana about us ippudu IndiaMART ippudu meeru ippudu unna madam laptop mundu unnara.
Executive: Aa unnanu unnanu cheppandi sir.
Customer: Okka sari nadi profile open chestara.
Executive: Nenu profile open chesanu oka nimisham.
Customer: Meeru open lo petti undara ippudu.
Customer: Aa avunu madam.
Executive: Ippudu meeku left side la dashboard profile adi mari option undi kada.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Profile la photos ni separate ga add chese option undi sir website.
Customer: Undi kada option.
Executive: Hmm aa ada velli meeru add cheyochu sir idi add cheste enta automatic.
Customer: Add chesindi nenu already chesindi cheptanu meeku okka sari ippudu profile lo website pages undi kada add chestira home page about us.
Customer: Website pages lo lekunte about us dantlo pettanu nenu.
Executive: Okay okay.
Customer: Only rendu browsers pettanu annamata.
Executive: Sarendi sir.
Customer: Okka sari chudandi madam.
Executive: Ayite naku edune oka nimisham.
Customer: Naku kanipistunda adi.
Executive: Show avvatledu sir mi sure ena.
Customer: About us lo naku free gane undi.
Customer: About us lo nenu moodu pettanu sir ippudu mottam ippudu meeku okka sari photo pettanu chudandi.
Executive: Meeru meeru ippudu profiles la again about us page lo velli chudandi meeku meeru upload chesindi show ayitundi anta sir naku show avvatledu kani mi profile la.
Customer: Nenu same website lo aa profile open chesukuni profile la home page anaka about us undi kada.
Customer: Profile lo website pages website pages lo click chesina taravata about us.
Executive: Aa about us.
Customer: Idi click cheste idi unnai kada nenu pettindi.
Executive: Meeru add chesindi unda.
Customer: Aa okka nimisham meeku photo pedutunnanu chudandi okka sari meeku idi kanipinchatleda madam.
Executive: Aha ledu sir.
Executive: Ippudu nenu okati add chesindanu mi browser ade show ayi about us la.
Executive: So adine naku show avvatledu.
Customer: Okka sari.
Executive: Vachinda.
Customer: Ippudu nenu oka browser add chesindanu adi vastunda ani chudandi website page la.
Customer: Website page lo website page lo about us website page vellala no about us.
Customer: Emi ledu madam.
Customer: Emi leda.
Customer: Only moode unnai indulo YS ani undi taravata indulo about us lo click chesina taravata moode chupistunnai YS business objectives about us ani cheppi unnai.
Executive: Appudu meeru add chesindi add avvaleda ayite nenu oka photo add chesindi add ayipoindi.
Customer: Meeru etla profile lo ani cheppi pettara about us lo.
Executive: Ippudu screenshot pettanu chudandi.
Customer: Idi naku.
Customer: Sir voice break ayitundi.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Sir voice break ayitundi sir.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Maybe meeru add chesindi about us lo undunnae emo ippudu meeku catalogue link meeru ampistanu.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Aa madam garu.
Executive: Mi catalogue link ampistanu okasari link open chesi meeru add chesina photos undani check cheseyara.
Executive: Maybe add avvunda add avvunte dinto simpakunda main ga profile use cheste kavachu show avvu sir.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Kanisam ippudu meeru add chesindanna naku itla dashboard lo gani profile lo gani kanipinchali kada madam adi kanipinchatledu kada.
Executive: Avunu sir meeru meeru add chesindi naku show avvatledu nenu ippudu add chesindi meeku show avvatledu ade cheptanu maybe main page lo show avvunnay emo okasari check cheyandi ani cheptanu.
Customer: Main page ante indulo dashboard indulo madam.
Executive: Ledu ippudu nenu meeku kanipistanu oka nimisham line lo undandi.
Executive: Sandwich groups.
summary:
Concerns:

- Unable to add browser to catalog.

- Image rejected during upload.

- Photos not showing in profile.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the customer's profile.

- Executive added a photo to test.

- Executive sent catalog link to customer.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to check main page for photos.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, profile, website, photos
